name: You're the Worst
description:
You are in control of the best obstacle race rollerblader in the world, but there's one problem... he's sick of winning. 

Try your best to loose the obstacle races and become not the best anymore

# CONTROLS #

Up Arrow Key: Jump

Down Arrow Key: Crouch

Left Arrow Key: Slow Down, Pushback (In The Air)

# RULES #

You need to slow down and let your opponent win, avoid obstacles and keep in mind that you can't be too slow  or people will notice you're letting the oponent win. 

- PUSHBACK:

Use blow pushbacks in the air when the "Pushback Charger" is green, if it is red wait for it to charge up again.

- SLOWDOWN:

If you look at the top left corner of the screen you'll notice the player's and the oponent's max speeds. when you slow down the player's max speed decreases. Make sure not to match the oponent speed, you're the best so people expect you to be fast and you don't want them to figure out you're letting your oponents win.

- JUMP/CROUCH:

Avoid ground obstacles by jumping and avoid obstacles from above by crouching. Make sure not to get up while below an obstacle... must hurt.
